trans-unit.source: The WebServicesInteroperability class provides methods to verify whether a given Web service or services conforms to a given Web Services Interoperability (WS-I) Organization specification.
The WS-I publishes non-proprietary Web services specifications to promote the interoperability of Web services across platforms.
Verifies whether a given Web service or services conforms to a given WS-I specification, and provides a list of any violations that it finds.
The WS-I publishes non-proprietary Web services specifications to promote the interoperability of Web services across platforms.
A member of <xref href="System.Web.Services.WsiProfiles"></xref> that indicates a Web services interoperability specification.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescription"></xref> that describes a Web service.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.BasicProfileViolationCollection"></xref> that contains any violations that were found.
if the Web service described by description conforms to the Web services interoperability specification indicated by claims; otherwise.
Verifies whether a given Web service or services conforms to a given WS-I specification, and provides a list of any violations that it finds.
The WS-I publishes non-proprietary Web services specifications to promote the interoperability of Web services across platforms.
A member of <xref href="System.Web.Services.WsiProfiles"></xref> that indicates a Web services interoperability specification.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.ServiceDescriptionCollection"></xref> that contains Web service descriptions.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.BasicProfileViolationCollection"></xref> that contains any violations that were found.
if the Web service descriptions contained in descriptions conform to the Web services interoperability specification indicated by claims; otherwise.
Verifies whether a given Web service or services conforms to a given WS-I specification, and provides a list of any violations that it finds.
The WS-I publishes non-proprietary Web services specifications to promote the interoperability of Web services across platforms.
A member of <xref href="System.Web.Services.WsiProfiles"></xref> that indicates a Web services interoperability specification.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.WebReference"></xref> that describes a Web service.
A <xref href="System.Web.Services.Description.BasicProfileViolationCollection"></xref> that contains any violations that were found.
if the Web service described by webReference conforms to the Web services interoperability specification indicated by claims; otherwise.
